name: Low Yiyiu

I'm Low Yiyiu from Malaysia.
I'm a developer at wwwavy. Check out some of my side projects below.

projects.name: FiftyFifty
projects.description: FiftyFifty, submit two links and receive a permalink where you can share it to someone and they will have a 50-50 chance of opening either one of the link. Inspired by r/FiftyFifty and Degstu. This page's backend is PHP and the data are stored in a SQL database.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Current page. Simple portfolio page built with JSX and TailwindCSS. Data is stored as JSON for easier maintenance.

projects.name: Placeholder
projects.description: Dynamically renders image placeholders on the server side using PHP with customisation for dimension, type, background and font.
